decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The property is a row of lock-up garages which were erected under planning permission HAR/342/A dated 27-NOV-52

Condition : 2 - The proposal seeks to show continuous use of the garages for the repair, servicing, and sale of motor vehicles and uses within use classes B1.B2 and B.8. The application is supported by Statutory Declarations:
1) Malcom Roberts                  Proving use for 26 years upto 1988
   PEVERIL
   Jordans Way
   Jordan
   Bucks

2) Sir Horace Walter Cutler        Proving use from erection to 1988
   52 High Street
   Pinner
   Middx

3) Malcolm Roberts                 Proving use up to the present                 PERERIL    
   Jordans Way
   Jordan
   Bucks

Condition : 3 - The continues use of the premises is in excess of a period of ten years and is therefore immune from enforcement action under Section 171(B)(3) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
description: CERTIFICATE OF LAWFUL EXISTING USE: USE FOR THE REPAIR, SERVICING AND SALE OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND USES WITHIN CLASSES B1, B2 AND B8
